Zabe Bent is an urban planner and designer with extensive experience in street design and sustainable mobility. 
She served as Director of Design at the National Association of City Transportation Officials (NACTO), where she led 
the development of street design guidelines and supported cities in implementing Complete Streets strategies in the U.S. 
Previously, she worked as a Transportation Planner at the San Francisco County Transportation Authority. She holds a 
Masters in City Planning and a Master of Science in Transportation from MIT, as well as a Bachelor of Arts from Columbia University.
